alert.note: Alert for Monroe (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Craig and northeastern Monroe Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moncove Lake State Park, or near Paint Bank, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Castle... Paint Bank... Sinking Creek... Abbott... Sweet Springs... Craig Springs... and Moncove Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central and west central Virginia.
